newsitem.title: USA: Canadian spot natgas prices rise again with NYMEX.
newsitem.headline: Canadian spot natgas prices rise again with NYMEX.

text.p: Canadian spot natural gas prices moved higher again Tuesday in the West as NYMEX's August contract rallied and demand remained strong in the Northwest, traders said.
Gas at Alberta's AECO storage hub was quoted at C$1.54-1.55 per gigajoule, up an average of three cents from Monday.
August/October AECO was talked at C$1.53-1.56 per GJ.
Boosting the Alberta market early, traders said, was the rally of NYMEX's August Henry Hub gas futures to a high of $2.14, up 7.2 cents on the day.
